name: Night Driver
summary:
Night Driver was produced by Atari in 1976.

A nighttime driving game where your headlights illuminate the posts on both sides of the road. The object is to stay on the road as long as possible without crashing. As the game progresses, however, the road becomes narrower and more winding.
